snippet: Small negotiating teams assembled by the administration slipped secretly away to bargaining tables at locations around the world to do the delicate work of diplomacy.
abstract: Diplomatic Memo; three of Pres Obama's diplomatic achievements--reestablishing ties with Cuba; interim nuclear agreement with Iran; and climate-change pact with China--resulted from negotiations; not since 1971 has a president embraced undercover diplomacy with such enthusiasm.
lead_paragraph: Small negotiating teams assembled by the administration slipped secretly away to bargaining tables at locations around the world to do the delicate work of diplomacy.

headline.main: How Obama’s Undercover Statecraft Secured Three Major Accords
headline.print_headline: How Obama’s Undercover Statecraft Secured Three Major Accords
